course.subject: IELM
course.name: Advanced Production Planning and Control
course.description: Operation mission and modern production planning and control systems. MRP, JIT , and OPT methods. Integrated processes and systems design. Software packages will be introduced through a simulated company environment.

reviews.author: jde1993
reviews.comment_content: The content is similar as IELM4100, but there are more proof here, so a bit math background is required. However, it's not that technical comparing to the other IE courses.
reviews.comment_teaching: Prof. LIU is pretty nice and helpful. And the way she taught is clear.
reviews.comment_grading:
Since its a PG course, the grade is usually good enough
If you can attend the lecture and figure out those included in the lecture notes, you can get good grade for sure.
reviews.comment_workload: One homework every week with around 3 questions. The midterm and final are accumulative.
